attributes.action: Instigate the first ever Great British Shakespeare Event in 2012 to match the Olympics and to give the arts their due by celebrating the greatest creative artist of all time, in every town, city, village, school, youth club, women's institute etc etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to parallel the Olympics with an equally striking cultural event. This need not be paid for centrally but enthused by local people at local levels - professionals and amateurs, the young and the elderly, of all cultures and religions, in every town, village, city, school, club,community centre. It should be the most historic and unifying arts celebration of all time: The Great British Shakespeare Event 2012.
